Collection.name: Records
Collection.type: Eamon.ThirdParty.BTree`1[[Eamon.Framework.IArtifact, Eamon, Version=1.4.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null]], Eamon, Version=1.4.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: hand-lettered sign

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a small hand-lettered sign, done in blue lettering, and decorated with hand-drawn gloves in the corners.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: red structure

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Sitting in the center of the room is a low structure with smooth, translucent walls that glow dimly with a red light, illuminating the room. It is perhaps ten feet high, and perhaps forty feet on a side.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: chicken house

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Set in one corner of the courtyard is a small fenced-in chicken house. You note absently that it seems to contain mostly roosters.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You notice a particularly feisty-looking rooster. He eyes you back, then lets out with a lusty "Cock-A-Doodle-Doo!"

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Placed in several positions here are the most amazing statues; lifelike in every detail, they could be mistaken for real people but for their uniform grey color.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: stone serpent

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You behold a perfect statue of a medium-sized serpent with enormous eyes. The scales of its skin curiously resemble tiny cobblestones. It was obviously a guardian, but of what?

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: glowing wall

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a translucent, glowing wall. Your hand passes right through it, as if it wasn't there!

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: flat ceramic mold

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a long ceramic mold made from a fine glazed brown pottery. It bears the impression of a flat metal sword.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: flat wooden mold

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a long wooden mold, carved from fine-grained oak and smoothly varnished to perfection. It contains an impression of a flat metal sword.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: flat glass sword

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a wonderfully made sword, which has been cast from clear crystal glass. A perfect reproduction of your own metal sword, it has a wide, thin blade, and dangerous sharp edges. Being made from thin glass, it is very fragile.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: triangular glass sword

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a wonderfully made sword, which has been cast from clear crystal glass. A perfect reproduction of the wood model sword, it has a long three-sided blade of triangular cross-section.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see an iron sledgehammer. It is so heavy that you must use a two-handed grip when you swing it.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: silver shield

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This is not the wondrous polished silver mirror that you desired, being stolen and not made to your specification.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a large rectangular mirror.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: glass plate

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a large, rectangular sheet of glass.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: silver nitrate

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a small, clear, stoppered vial that is filled with a black powder. The vial is labeled, "Silver Nitrate".

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: iron sword

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a sturdy iron sword.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: wooden sword

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a wooden sword. It is finely crafted, and has a three-sided blade of triangular cross-section.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a strange glove. It is made from an unusual silvery fabric that is quite thin and limp.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a set of stout leather straps such as are used as handles on the backs of shields.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a broken fragment of a narrative that was chiseled into one wall.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see an old, battered fish-oil lamp. The cracked glass chimney rests atop an earthenware reservoir; a small fill hole is closed with a wooden plug.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see your stolen weapons. God knows what your fooling around has done to the program flags. On your head be it!

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: round ceramic mold

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a long ceramic mold made from a fine glazed brown pottery. It bears the impression of a triangular sword.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: round wooden mold

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a long wooden mold, carved from fine-grained oak and smoothly varnished to perfection. It contains an impression of a triangular sword.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: If you managed to obtain this artifact, you have cheated. Don't blame *me* if you start getting weird responses from the program!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see your ill-gotten silver. Judas would have been proud! Don't be too surprised if the silversmith seems to lose his mind now.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This is not a "real" artifact. What are you doing with it, anyway? At any rate congratulations! You have managed to put the astrologer out of business.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The barkeep sets a foamy wooden mug of beer before you on the bar.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: mirror shield

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see your finished mirror shield - a large, rectangular plate of silvered glass, with a pair of stout leather arm straps attached to the back side.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: low yellow rail

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Bending to one knee, you see that there is glowing writing along the length of the rail.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: TODO: convert

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: red light

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A niche in one wall contains a small rod of red light.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: brown light

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The glowing tunnel wall reveals a niche containing a rod of brown light.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: orange light

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A niche in the wall reveals a small rod of orange light.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: violet light

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The wall contains a niche that discloses a small rod of violet light.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: green light

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The cliff wall has a deep niche cut into it. The niche holds a small green rod of light.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: white light

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The wall reveals a niche, that is the resting place of a small rod of the purest white light.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: yellow light

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A low depression in the center of the floor of the pinnacle contains a small rod of yellow light.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: blue light

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a shaft of blue light, larger than the small light rods used to pass through the maze. It coruscates with blinding flashes of blue fire; listening intently, you can detect a low, nearly subsonic hum.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: silver hammer

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a small hammer. The small head and wide striking face reminds you of the hammers you have seen swordsmiths use. But this one is made from solid silver!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a bizarre one-piece goggle with blue lenses.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see all that remains of the shadow warrior: a heavy black gauntlet, shot with blue highlights.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a large solid gold reliquary of incredible craftsmanship. Marvelous etched crystal windows grace the four sides of the vessel.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a nondescript pair of scuffed blue boots.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a quiver-like pouch made from a wondrous white cloth, thin and supple, and shot with silver highlights. When the pouch is opened, it reveals seven long, thin pockets of the same material.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Each wall has an empty niche.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: silver anvil

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Sitting near one wall is a huge anvil that appears to be made of solid silver. It has a shape that puts you in mind of the special anvils used by swordsmiths to finish the swords they make.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: bound being

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: At the foot of the throne lies a bound being who is wrapped in several tons of heavy iron anchor chain. The prisoner's body is nearly hidden beneath the many coils of chain links.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: star wand

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The blue light blazes like a blue sun! It shimmers and throws blue sparks as if it were a white-hot iron!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The blue temple's wall here is graced by a huge mural depicting a figure wrapped in a seamless blue armor, unbroken but for an odd lens over his eyes, and blue boots. He wields a blue light as he strides through the air above the city.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a basket of delicious looking, fresh-baked rolls. They smell heavenly.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You are holding a potion of questionable value, since it has been stolen and may therefore be cursed. You decide that it would be better not to even open it, much less drink it.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: magician's hat

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The hat flinches from your touch! It wraps itself firmly around the hook, and seems determined to remain where it is.

Collection.name: FreeUids
Collection.type: System.Collections.Generic.List`1[[System.Int64, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089]], mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089
